data.name: Medical Research Assistant
data.description: AI-powered assistant for medical research literature analysis

input.query: Recent clinical trials for diabetes treatment

results: Trial NCT12345: Phase III diabetes study
Trial NCT67890: New insulin delivery method

sampleIO.description: Example query for recent clinical trials

integrationExamples.code:
import requests

response = requests.post(
  "https://api.medresearch.bayer.com/v1/agent",
  json={"query": "diabetes trials"},
  headers={"Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"}
)
print(response.json())

curl -X POST https://api.medresearch.bayer.com/v1/agent \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"query": "diabetes trials"}'
